quotes: And later on when we landed back in Timor, in Dili, and UNTAET started to set themselves up, we found out they never even saw the plan.

organizations.name: World Bank
quotes: And that is when the World Bank contacted me, because they knew that there was a technical group there.

organizations.name: United Nations’ Department of Political Affairs (DPA)
quotes: That plan we took to New York and we gave it to [the United Nations’ Department of Political Affairs]. Now, all this time we were working with DPA.
